mapper.select: SELECT column_name AS name, CASE WHEN is_nullable='YES' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS isNull, data_type AS myBatisJdbcType, column_type AS jdbcType, CASE WHEN column_key = 'PRI' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS isPk, column_comment AS comments FROM information_schema.columns WHERE 1=1 AND table_schema = #{tableSchema} AND table_name = #{tableName}
SELECT table_name AS NAME, table_COMMENT AS comments FROM information_schema.tables WHERE 1=1 and table_schema=#{tableSchema}
